message_1: Find the discrete logarithm of 5 to the base 2 modulo 19.
message_2:
To find the discrete logarithm of 5 to the base 2 modulo 19, we are looking for an integer x such that:

2^x ≡ 5 (mod 19)

We can start by calculating powers of 2 modulo 19 until we find one that is congruent to 5:

2^1 ≡ 2 (mod 19)
2^2 ≡ 4 (mod 19)
2^3 ≡ 8 (mod 19)
2^4 ≡ 16 (mod 19)
2^5 ≡ 13 (mod 19)
2^6 ≡ 7 (mod 19)
2^7 ≡ 14 (mod 19)
2^8 ≡ 9 (mod 19)
2^9 ≡ 18 (mod 19)
2^10 ≡ 17 (mod 19)
2^11 ≡ 15 (mod 19)
2^12 ≡ 11 (mod 19)
2^13 ≡ 3 (mod 19)
2^14 ≡ 6 (mod 19)
2^15 ≡ 12 (mod 19)
2^16 ≡ 5 (mod 19)

We found that 2^16 ≡ 5 (mod 19), so the discrete logarithm of 5 to the base 2 modulo 19 is x = 16.
